casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Paris Jujuan TODD 18A14-2 Supreme Court of North Carolina. September 2, 2016 Joseph L. Hyde, Assistant Attorney General, N. Lorrin Freeman, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina. Reid Cater, Attorney at Law, for Todd, Paris Jujuan.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 2nd of September 2016 by State of NC for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 2nd of September 2016."
